title: Video: I-Team: Residents express concern over asbestos
text: I-Team: Residents express concern over asbestos KLAS Las Vegas, NVSep. 02, 2015. 02:14 AM EST What to do about deadly dust, or naturally occurring asbestos, in the Boulder City area? That que... More » What to do about deadly dust, or naturally occurring asbestos, in the Boulder City area? That question drew a packed house Tuesday night in Boulder City, where citizens and scientists gathered to seek answers. « Less Tags
